hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Enter your PIN greek yogurt benefits for dogs It’s creative vision? You mean datamining consumers for targeted interactive ads? Not sure I’d call that a vision… Forcing Kinect to always be connected really served no other purpose. Given the whole PRISM fiasco and the fact that Microsoft already allows the government to monitor Skype users via webcam, I can’t imagine why anyone would want to use the Kinect anyway. It’s not like I have anything to hide, but the Constitution exists for a reason. I don’t like being looked at randomly without my knowledge. I’m pretty sure I’m not the only one.
